greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of natural numbers: a(1) = 1, a(2n) = 2*a(n), a(2n+1) = A269379(a(A268674(2n+1))).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(1) = 1, then after for even n, a(n) = 2*a(n/2), and for odd n, a(n) = A269379(a(A268674(n))).
As a composition of other permutations:
A000035(a(n)) = A000035(n). [Preserves the parity of n.]
a(A008578(n)) = A003309(n). [Maps noncomposites to Ludic numbers.]
program: (Scheme, two versions, both using memoization-macro definec)
xref: Differs from A255407 for the first time at n=38, where a(38) = 46, while A255407(38) = 38.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 03 2016
